name: masayan-uni-plugins
description: Claude Code plugins for documentation and development workflows

plugins.name: claude-md-creator
plugins.description: Create optimal CLAUDE.md files - minimal (under 60 lines), WHY/WHAT/HOW structure

plugins.name: skill-scanner
plugins.description: Scan and list registered Claude agent skills on Mac - read-only, safe operation

plugins.name: image-converter
plugins.description: Convert PNG/JPG/JPEG images to WebP, ICO, SVG formats

plugins.name: ocr
plugins.description: Extract text from images using OCR and copy to clipboard

plugins.name: gen-ai-image-prompt-creator
plugins.description: Generate image prompts for characters, manga, thumbnails, diagrams, and SNS images

plugins.name: ai-news-fetcher
plugins.description: Fetch AI news from the web and generate bilingual markdown articles

plugins.name: technyan-x-post-generator
plugins.description: Generate X post drafts for Tech-nyan character from articles in Japanese and English

plugins.name: note-optimizer
plugins.description: Optimize articles for note platform with proper formatting, titles, and mobile optimization

plugins.name: x-post-optimizer
plugins.description: Optimize X posts for algorithm and engagement, generate quote reposts

plugins.name: youtube-metadata-creator
plugins.description: Generate YouTube video metadata (title, description, hashtags) for tech videos
